item.title: Analyzing the ggcharts CRAN Downloads. Part 1: Getting Data
item.description: Introduction It’s been a little over two weeks since my ggcharts package has been published on CRAN. As you can imagine I am curious to see how many people actually use the package. While there is no way to actually measure the usage, the number of package downloads seems like a good proxy to me. CRAN Logs Getting data on the number of package downloads is fairly easy thanks to the cranlogs package.
